name: Twirl Knight and the Fun Button!
name_original: Twirl Knight and the Fun Button!
description:
You have to click on the Fun Button! 

But some orcs want to prevent you from clicking it! 

Fortunately, the Twirl Knight is here to help you!

Click on the button with your mouse, avoid orcs, make the Best Score!

(Score is not saved after closing the game)

This game was made during the VGLab 2 event of At0mium.

The musics was made by me with https://beepbox.co/
All asset are free and most of them can be found here! https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
